Method Detail

getMassSpectra

public Array getMassSpectra(int x,
                            int y)
Getter for one mass spectra. If the requested mass spectra is out of bound, then this method will return null.

Parameters:
x - scanline number
y - mass spectra inside this scanline
Returns:
array representing one mass spectra

getScanlineMS

public java.util.List<Array> getScanlineMS(int x)
This method will create a List of Array containing the mass spectra of scanline x. All this mass spectra are normalized to one size.

Parameters:
x - scan line number
Returns:
list of mass spectra
